description.value:
You're connected to the fount of vitality and void energy that flows through all living things on every planet. You weave these energies into spells that heal your allies and harm your enemies.

Tradition divine

Connection Skill Medicine

Connection Spells

  • cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Stabilize];
  • 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Heal];
  • 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.False Vitality];
  • 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Entropy Strike];
  • 4th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Genetic Regeneration];
  • 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Breath of Life];
  • 6th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Vampiric Exsanguination];
  • 7th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Execute];
  • 8th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Moment of Renewal];
  • 9th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Massacre]

Epiphany Spells

  • initial: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Infusion];
  • advanced: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Vitality Nova];
  • greater: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Vital Rebirth]

Harmony When you Transfer Vitality, attempt to counteract one affliction affecting the target, or attempt to counteract one effect of your choice imposing one of the following conditions on the target: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Blinded], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Clumsy], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Dazzled], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Deafened], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Enfeebled], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Sickened].

Perfect Harmony Add @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Doomed], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Drained], @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Paralyzed], and @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stunned] to the list of conditions you can counteract with your harmony. In addition, if you didn't counteract the effect, but you would've if its counteract rank were 2 lower, instead suppress the effect until the beginning of your next turn. The effect's duration doesn't elapse while it's suppressed.
